title: Obtain the Sinner
text: Are you trying to take me home? Hehehe... if you treat me as a pet, it won't end well...

title: Raise to Phase 1
text: Hmm... this reminds me of the ouroboros.

title: Raise to Phase 3
text: I will... wrap around you tightly...

title: Level Start
text: I've locked onto my target prey, hiss...

title: Win Battles
text: Thank you for making me feel that I am still alive.

title: Lose Battles
text: Haha... pain is a reassuring sensation.

title: Ultimate Skill
text: Hibernate here. You will thank me later.

title: Die in Battles
text: Do you feel... happy?

title: Greeting
text: Ah, a rare guest! You're here to see me again?

title: Conversation 1
text: I'm neither human nor monster, hmm... I think I might be a venomous snake?

title: Conversation 2
text: Will I get poisoned if I bite my own tongue...? You're so funny. It's as if snake venom got into your head.

title: Conversation 3
text: Everyone has the right to laugh. Whoever takes it away will go to hell.

title: Special Conversation 1
text: I can understand that some people don't like snakes, so you can also understand that I don't like some people, right?

title: Special Conversation 2
text: Misery is the culprit that destroys laughter, but also heralds the birth of a new world. What do you think?

title: Special Conversation 3
text: I love the way you smile, and it's even better if it's because of me.

title: Full Compliance
text: Can you give me a hug? Your temperature reminds me of spring, the time of awakening, the season of rebirth... I can hear our hearts beating together.

title: Idle
text: It's so quiet... it's as if the end of the world is nigh. Looks like I'll be able to get a good night's sleep.

title: Annoyed
text: Hmm... seems like you want me to take a bite of you?

title: Special Attention
text: To look for one leaf in an entire forest... to lock onto one monster in an entire herd... you really have a lot of energy.

title: Dispatch
text: If this can cheer you up...

title: Dispatch Complete
text: Did you like this performance?

title: Level Up
text: Hope you have fun...

title: Join Team
text: Today's performance is about to start. Get ready to laugh your head off!

title: Head Pat
text: The hero pierced the snake's cranium with his sword, beheading the monstrous serpent. You know where the cranium is? You just touched it.

title: Attire Obtained
text: I had a long dream, a dream of pursuing happiness, a dream of... rebirth.

title: Greeting
text: Oh... It's spring already? I'll get up then... Give me two more minutes...

title: Ordinary Contact 1
text: The sheets are so warm... Chief, if you can join me up here... I'll be very happy...

title: Ordinary Contact 2
text: I can't miss this festive holiday... But I need some more time to prepare...

title: Ordinary Contact 3
text: No one can take away my... my blankets... Take away my Chief... Hehe... Snore... Snore...

title: Ordinary Contact 4
text: Mmm... Time for spring cleaning? But my place is quite tidy already... Or do you want to help me?

title: Idle
text: Sigh... The fireworks outside... really disturb my dreams...

title: Level Up
text: Mmm... Just a little bit longer...

title: Head Pat (touch head)
text: Your hand... is still so warm...

title: Special Attention
text: My gosh, I'm almost done dressing! If you keep rushing me... I'll bite you!
